summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來變更或移除的公開會透過屬性字典中的項目。This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of properties that are exposed through a . 屬性字典中的索引鍵是屬性的名稱。The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties. 物件是類型。The objects are of type . 在覆寫方法中，設計工具會清除所有的屬性，除了和。In this overridden method, the designer clears all properties except and .

para.span: 您可以直接篩選字典可透過存取參數，或者您可以將它保留不變。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果您正在覆寫這個方法，請執行您自己的篩選之後呼叫的基底實作。

span.span: If you are overriding this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.
